title: Loading matches on MacBook taking insanlu
body:
taking insanely * long lol anyway
My 2012 MacBook Pro has a super hard time loading matches. I'm constantly unconnecting and always the last to join on average 5  minutes into the match. One of my matches today I loaded 22 minutes into a match. 
Yes, that's right, twenty-two fucking minutes in.  
It sucks for not only myself but for my teammates too. There's no way I can come back after being out for so long. It's the only game I play so I can't compare it to other game load time but I have no issue running other programs. What can I do to stop this? I don't think it's a wifi problem because even when connected via an Ethernet cable I still have loading problems. Any advice helps. Thank you.

replies.body: You're likely having an unstable connection if you're getting kicked off or spending a lot of time trying to load in.  Try out the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a fix.  Make sure to go over each step to rule out possibilities, and test it in a custom game.  Let me know if you have any questions!
